Description: Unique listing identifier assigned by AutoScout24.
Textual description of the vehicle listing.
Average rating of the seller or vehicle.
Percentage of users recommending the seller or vehicle.
Currency of the listed price (default: EUR).
Indicates if the price is negotiable.
VAT rate applied to the listing (in %).
Raw mileage value extracted from listing.
General type of the vehicle (e.g., car, van, truck).
Boolean flag indicating presence of particle filter.
Category of fuel (e.g., Diesel, Petrol, Electric).
Primary fuel used by the vehicle.
Electric range achievable in city driving (km).
CO₂ emissions in grams per kilometer.
Combined fuel consumption (WLTP, liters per 100 km).
Combined electric consumption (WLTP, liters-equivalent per 100 km).
List of comfort-related features (e.g., heated seats, panoramic roof).
List of entertainment or media features (e.g., Bluetooth, sound system).
List of extra or miscellaneous features.
List of safety-related features (e.g., ABS, lane assist).
Boolean: True if the vehicle is used.
Boolean: True if the vehicle is new.
Boolean: True if the vehicle was preregistered.
Boolean: True if the car had an accident history.
Boolean: True if a complete service history exists.
Boolean: True if declared as a non-smoking vehicle.
Boolean: True if the car was used as a rental.
Original sales market of the vehicle.
Country code of the listing location.
Postal code of the listing location.
City where the vehicle is listed.
Street name of the seller or dealer.
Boolean flag: True if seller is a dealership.
Indicates if the car has a warranty.
